meanings.sent1: She rewove the torn fabric skillfully.
meanings.sent2: Yesterday, I rewove the threads to fix the hole in my shirt.
meanings.sent3: The spider rewove its web after it got destroyed by the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her memories rewove themselves into a beautiful tapestry of the past.
meanings.sent5: The artist rewove the colors in the painting to create a new masterpiece.

meanings.sent1: He rewove the basket to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: After the storm, she rewove the damaged roof of her house.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel rewove its nest with fresh twigs and leaves.
meanings.sent4: Time rewove the threads of fate, creating a new pattern.
meanings.sent5: The tailor rewove the hem of the dress to make it longer.
